name: MagTech Revolving Rifle
description: A homemade handheld coilgun with a revolver mechanism, created from instructions on a MagTech pamphlet. Capable of a 6kJ mode for standard operation, and a 28kJ mode for when something needs a hold put into it. It's currently set to 6kJ mode.

use_action.msg: You flip the switch to 28kJ. Something is going to have a bad day.
